name: Shiju Varghese
body:
### Cloud Solutions Architect & Node.js Expert.

Shiju Varghese is a Microsoft MVP and a Technical Architect, specializes in providing solution on Cloud and Enterprise Mobility. His current technology focus is on Windows Azure, HDInsight, HTML5/JavaScript as a Platform, Node.js and Koa.j. Shiju is passionate about building scalable Cloud apps on the Windows Azure Platform. His areas of interest include Cloud Computing, Big Data, Enterprise Mobility, Mobile Backend as a Service (MBaaS), Domain-Driven Design (DDD), Test Driven Development (TDD). Shiju is an enthusiast on Agile and Lean development practices. 

### Technical Consultant.

Shiju is a Solutions Consultant, who provides consulting for cloud and mobile apps. As a technical consultant, he provides following services:

* Providing solutions and strategies for building apps with Cloud First and Mobile First strategy.
* Solutions consulting on Cloud, Enterprise Mobility, Hybrid Mobile Apps, Mobile backend as a services.
* Providing consulting and training on agile and lean development practices. 
* Technology consulting and training on Node.js for building next-generation web apps and real-time systems.
